summary.span: 提供靜態方法操作繫結，包括 、 和 物件。

span.span: Provides static methods to manipulate bindings, including , , and objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會公開一組靜態方法做為資料繫結的協助程式作業。This class exposes a set of static methods that serve as helper operations for data bindings.

summary.span: 透過應用程式在呼叫 EnableCollectionSynchronization 時指定的同步處理機制，提供對集合的存取。

span.span: Provides access to a collection by using the synchronization mechanism that the application specified when it called EnableCollectionSynchronization.

span.span: Removes all bindings, including bindings of type , , and , from the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的物件不是資料繫結，這個方法沒有任何作用。If the specified object is not data-bound, this method has no effect.

summary.span: 如果有的話，請從屬性移除繫結。

span.span: Removes the binding from a property if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的屬性是資料繫結與， ，或，這個方法會移除對應的繫結運算式，然後還原到之前的任何區域值屬性的值已設定透過繫結。If the given property is data-bound with a , , or , this method removes the corresponding binding expression and restores the value of the property to what it was before any local value was set through the binding. 如果指定的屬性不是資料繫結，這個方法沒有任何作用。If the given property is not data-bound, this method has no effect.

span.span: The and parameters cannot be .

summary.span: 取得物件，從視覺化樹狀結構中移除項目容器時，它會取代 。

span.span: Gets an object that replaces the when an item container is removed from the visual tree.

value.span: 在項目容器從視覺化樹狀結構中移除時取代 的物件。

span.span: An object that replaces the when an item container is removed from the visual tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性，如果您要應付的項目容器。Use this property if you need to deal with the of an item container. 項目容器是 UI 元素的顯示中的項目。An item container is the UI element that displays an item in an . 當是資料繫結至集合，項目容器會產生每個項目。When an is data bound to a collection, an item container is generated for each item. 在某些情況下，項目容器會從視覺化樹狀結構移除。In some cases, item containers are removed from the visual tree. 移除項目容器的其中兩個典型情況是項目從基礎集合中移除時，當已啟用虛擬化。Two typical cases where an item container is removed are when an item is removed from the underlying collection and when virtualization is enabled on the . 在這些情況下，的項目容器的屬性會設定為屬性，您應該檢查是否等於才能存取中事件項目容器。In these cases, the property of the item container will be set to the property You should check whether the is equal to the before accessing the in the event for item containers. 如需項目容器和虛擬化的詳細資訊，請參閱中的備註類別。For more information about item containers and virtualization, see the remarks in the class.

summary.span: 讓 物件能夠參與同步存取多個執行緒上所使用的集合。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection that is used on multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 應用程式可以顯示資料所使用的集合或其中一個子類別 (， ， ， ，依此類推。)。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通道所有其存取集合的子類別透過。 WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 同時而有執行緒親和性所在已建立，這表示，它們使用不同的執行緒上被禁止，而且會擲回例外狀況。 Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 實際上，這項限制適用於集合。 In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well.   若要使用多個執行緒上的集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads.   例如，在您想要更新集合 （新增或移除項目） 上的 「 資料收集 」 執行緒，在 「 使用者介面 」 的執行緒上顯示結果時，讓 UI 保持回應時資料收集的情況。   For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在這種情況下，您有責任確保同步處理 （「 執行緒安全 」） 存取集合項目。 In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection.   這通常是使用簡單的鎖定機制或更複雜的同步處理機制例如號誌、 重設事件等等。  雖然您必須同步處理對集合的應用程式的存取，您也必須保證該存取權從 WPF (特別是從) 參與相同的同步處理機制。   This is typically done using either a simple lock mechanism or a more elaborate synchronization mechanism such as semaphores, reset events, etc.   While you must synchronize your application's access to the collection, you must also guarantee that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism.  您可以藉由呼叫 方法執行這項作業。  You do this by calling the method.   若要使用多個執行緒的集合，其中之一就是 UI 執行緒擁有，應用程式須擔負下列責任：To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , an application has the following responsibilities: 1. 選擇同步處理機制。Choose a synchronization mechanism. 1. 同步處理從應用程式以使用該機制在集合的所有存取。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection using that mechanism. 1. 呼叫通知 WPF 的機制。Call to inform WPF of the mechanism. - 呼叫必須在 UI 執行緒上發生。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 之前使用不同的執行緒上的集合，或附加至集合前，必須發生呼叫，兩者取其較晚。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. - 呼叫多載，如果使用簡單的鎖定機制; 呼叫多載，如果使用更複雜的機制。Call the overload if using a simple lock mechanism; call the overload if using a more elaborate mechanism. 1. 請確認變更的集合，而且該變更通知 (透過) 是不可部分完成; 無法存取來自其他執行緒可以介入。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene.  （這是通常是免費的。  (This is usually free. For instance，保證，前提是所有的變更會受到同步處理。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果您呼叫 ，呼叫也必須在 UI 執行緒上會發生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果您想要在多個 UI 執行緒上使用相同的集合，您必須呼叫(和，如有需要) 分別在每個 UI 執行緒上。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死結。Avoid deadlock.  這是已經應用程式的責任之後選擇要使用同步處理，但它還必須考慮到帳戶 WPF 參與同步處理，在下列段落中所述。  This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization, as discussed in the following paragraph. 在 退貨，WPF 提供下列行為：In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 存取集合的指定同步處理機制。The accesses the collection using the given synchronization mechanism. - 會維護 「 陰影複製 」 使用的集合在 UI 執行緒上。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件會排入佇列 （在任何執行緒中） 上所顯示的送達。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 暫止的事件會套用至 UI 執行緒上以非同步方式的陰影複製時就有機會這麼做。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 不會直接使用應用程式可以看到任何其他同步處理機制。The won't directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 這是 WPF 的方法有助於避免發生死結 （請參閱上一個項目 7）。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7).   結果是，您可以變更任何執行緒上的集合，這些變更最後會出現在當 UI 執行緒會有 「 趕上 」 的時間。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up".  實作已調整成節流閥速率的變更會流至 UI 執行緒，讓背景執行緒從飽和，讓 UI 執行緒，並佔用一般使用者輸入的回應。  The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input.

summary.span: 使用簡單的鎖定機制，讓 物件能夠參與同步存取多個執行緒上所使用的集合。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection used on multiple threads by using a simple locking mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 應用程式可以顯示資料所使用的集合或其中一個子類別 (， ， ， ，依此類推。)。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通道所有其存取集合的子類別透過。 WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 同時而有執行緒親和性所在已建立，這表示，它們使用不同的執行緒上被禁止，而且會擲回例外狀況。 Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 實際上，這項限制適用於集合。 In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well.   若要使用多個執行緒上的集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads.   例如，在您想要更新集合 （新增或移除項目） 上的 「 資料收集 」 執行緒，在 「 使用者介面 」 的執行緒上顯示結果時，讓 UI 保持回應時資料收集的情況。   For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在這種情況下，您必須負責確保同步處理 （「 執行緒安全 」） 存取集合，並保證該存取權，從 WPF (特別是從) 參與相同的同步處理機制。 In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection and for guaranteeing that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism. 藉由呼叫方法中，您可以使用簡單的鎖定機制。 By calling the method, you can do this by using a simple lock mechanism.   若要使用多個執行緒的集合，其中之一就是 UI 執行緒擁有，您必須執行下列動作：To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , you must do the following: 1. 要鎖定時存取集合的物件具現化。Instantiate an object to lock when accessing the collection. 1. 同步處理從應用程式集合的所有存取，藉由鎖定該物件。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection by locking that object. 1. 呼叫通知 WPF 使用簡單的鎖定機制。Call to inform WPF that you are using a simple lock mechanism. - 呼叫必須在 UI 執行緒上發生。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 之前使用不同的執行緒上的集合，或附加至集合前，必須發生呼叫，兩者取其較晚。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. 1. 請確認變更的集合，而且該變更通知 (透過) 是不可部分完成; 無法存取來自其他執行緒可以介入。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene.  （這是通常是免費的。  (This is usually free. For instance，保證，前提是所有的變更會受到同步處理。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果您呼叫 ，呼叫也必須在 UI 執行緒上會發生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果您想要在多個 UI 執行緒上使用相同的集合，您必須呼叫(和，如有需要) 分別在每個 UI 執行緒上。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死結。Avoid deadlock.  一旦選擇要使用同步處理，但它還必須考慮到帳戶同步處理的 WPF 的參與，這是已經應用程式的責任。  This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization. （請參閱詳細資訊下, 面）。 (See more, below.) 在 退貨，WPF 提供下列行為：In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 存取使用的鎖定機制的集合。The accesses the collection using the locking mechanism. - 會維護 「 陰影複製 」 使用的集合在 UI 執行緒上。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件會排入佇列 （在任何執行緒中） 上所顯示的送達。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 暫止的事件會套用至 UI 執行緒上以非同步方式的陰影複製時就有機會這麼做。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 不是直接將使用的應用程式可以看到任何其他同步處理機制。The will not directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 這是 WPF 的方法有助於避免發生死結 （請參閱上一個項目 7）。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7).   結果是，您可以變更任何執行緒上的集合，這些變更最後會出現在當 UI 執行緒會有 「 趕上 」 的時間。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up".  實作已調整成節流閥速率的變更會流至 UI 執行緒，讓背景執行緒從飽和，讓 UI 執行緒，並佔用一般使用者輸入的回應。  The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input.

summary.span: 使用簡單鎖定以外的機制，讓 物件能夠參與同步存取多個執行緒上所使用的集合。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection used on multiple threads by using a mechanism other than a simple lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 應用程式可以顯示資料所使用的集合或其中一個子類別 (， ， ， ，依此類推。)。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通道所有其存取集合的子類別透過。 WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 同時而有執行緒親和性所在已建立，這表示，它們使用不同的執行緒上被禁止，而且會擲回例外狀況。 Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 實際上，這項限制適用於集合。 In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well.   若要使用多個執行緒上的集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads.   例如，在您想要更新集合 （新增或移除項目） 上的 「 資料收集 」 執行緒，在 「 使用者介面 」 的執行緒上顯示結果時，讓 UI 保持回應時資料收集的情況。   For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在這種情況下，您必須負責確保同步處理 （「 執行緒安全 」） 存取集合，並保證該存取權，從 WPF (特別是從) 參與相同的同步處理機制。 In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection and for guaranteeing that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism. 藉由呼叫方法中，您可以使用 同步處理機制，例如號誌、 重設事件等等。  若要使用多個執行緒的集合，其中之一就是 UI 執行緒擁有，您必須執行下列動作：By calling the method, you can do this by using a synchronization mechanism such as a semaphores, a reset event, etc.   To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , you must do the following: 1. 選擇同步處理機制。Choose a synchronization mechanism. 1. 同步處理從應用程式以使用該機制在集合的所有存取。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection using that mechanism. 1. 呼叫多載，以告知 WPF 使用簡單鎖定以外的機制。Call the overload to inform WPF that you are using a mechanism other than simple locking. - 呼叫必須在 UI 執行緒上發生。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 之前使用不同的執行緒上的集合，或附加至集合前，必須發生呼叫，兩者取其較晚。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. 1. 請確認變更的集合，而且該變更通知 (透過) 是不可部分完成; 無法存取來自其他執行緒可以介入。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene.  （這是通常是免費的。  (This is usually free. For instance，保證，前提是所有的變更會受到同步處理。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果您呼叫 ，呼叫也必須在 UI 執行緒上會發生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果您想要在多個 UI 執行緒上使用相同的集合，您必須呼叫(和，如有需要) 分別在每個 UI 執行緒上。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死結。Avoid deadlock.  一旦選擇要使用同步處理，但它還必須考慮到帳戶同步處理的 WPF 的參與，這是已經應用程式的責任。  This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization. （請參閱詳細資訊下, 面）。 (See more, below.) 在 退貨，WPF 提供下列行為：In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 存取集合，藉由呼叫的已註冊的下列引數：The accesses the collection by calling the registered with the following arguments: - `collection`： 感興趣的集合。`collection`: the collection of interest. - `context`： 已註冊的內容物件。`context`: the registered context object. - `accessMethod`： 執行實際存取的委派。`accessMethod`: a delegate that performs the actual access. - `writeAccess`:`true`如果委派將會修改集合`false`否則。`writeAccess`: `true` if the delegate will modify the collection; `false` otherwise. 您應該建立在集合上的同步處理 (使用`context`物件並`writeAccess`值，視需要)，呼叫`accessMethod`，再放開 同步處理。Your should establish synchronization on the collection (using the `context` object and the `writeAccess` value, as appropriate), call the `accessMethod`, then release synchronization. - 會維護 「 陰影複製 」 使用的集合在 UI 執行緒上。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件會排入佇列 （在任何執行緒中） 上所顯示的送達。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 暫止的事件會套用至 UI 執行緒上以非同步方式的陰影複製時就有機會這麼做。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 不是直接將使用的應用程式可以看到任何其他同步處理機制。The will not directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 這是 WPF 的方法有助於避免發生死結 （請參閱上一個項目 7）。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7).   結果是，您可以變更任何執行緒上的集合，這些變更最後會出現在當 UI 執行緒會有 「 趕上 」 的時間。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up".  實作已調整成節流閥速率的變更會流至 UI 執行緒，讓背景執行緒從飽和，讓 UI 執行緒，並佔用一般使用者輸入的回應。  The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input. `context`參數是任意物件傳遞至`callback`。The `context` parameter is an arbitrary object that is passed to the `callback`. 您可以使用它來判斷用來控制存取權的同步處理機制`collection`。You can use it to determine the synchronization mechanism used to control access to `collection`. `Context` 可以是`null`。`Context` can be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會維護繫結來源和繫結目標之間的連線。The object maintains the connection between the binding source and the binding target. 您可以取得藉由呼叫這個靜態方法，或藉由呼叫物件方法，在資料繫結或物件。You can obtain the object by calling this static method or by calling the method on a data-bound or object. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作使用的事件處理常式方法，以取得，然後呼叫屬性來存取繫結來源物件。The following example shows the implementation of a event handler that uses the method to obtain the and then calls the property to access the binding source object. `SavingsText`是繫結目標物件和是繫結目標屬性。The `SavingsText` is the binding target object and is the binding target property. [!code-csharp[DirectionalBinding#OnRentRaise](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DirectionalBinding/CSharp/Page1.xaml.cs#onrentraise)] [!code-vb[DirectionalBinding#OnRentRaise](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DirectionalBinding/VisualBasic/DirectionalBinding.vb#onrentraise)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立的新執行個體並將執行個體與指定的物件指定相依性屬性相關聯。This method creates a new instance of a and associates the instance with the given dependency property of the given object. 這個方法可以將繫結至任意地，可能不會公開它自己的 SetBinding 方法。This method is the way to attach a binding to an arbitrary that may not expose its own SetBinding method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個方法來設定繫結。The following example shows how to use this method to set a binding. 在此範例中，`myNewBindDef`是描述繫結的物件。In this example, `myNewBindDef` is a object that describes the binding. 繫結目標是`myDateText`，執行個體類別。The binding target is `myDateText`, an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[BindConversion#BOSetBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#bosetbinding)] [!code-vb[BindConversion#BOSetBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/BindConversion/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#bosetbinding)]
